00042 /*
00043  */
00044 void DATFileReader::Read(DATData& data)
00045 {
00046         data.Clear();
00047         GenericFileReader reader;
00048         if (fileName.empty())
00049         {
00050                 fileName = data.GetFilename();
00051         }
00052         reader.SetFilename(fileName);
00053         reader.Open(data.GetGenericData());
00054         DataGroupReader dcReader = reader.GetDataGroupReader(0);
00055         ReadGlobalGrid(data, dcReader);
00056         ReadSubgrids(data, dcReader);
00057         reader.Close();
00058 }
00059 
00060 /*
00061  * Read the global grid
00062  */
00063 void DATFileReader::ReadGlobalGrid(DATData& data, DataGroupReader& dcReader)
00064 {
00065         try
00066         {
00067                 FRegion rgn;
00068                 DataSetReader dpReader = dcReader.GetDataSetReader(DAT_GLOBAL_GRID);
00069                 int32_t cols = dpReader.GetDataSetHeader().GetColumnCnt();
00070 
00071                 u_int32_t gridStatus = 0;
00072                 if (cols > 0)
00073                 {
00074                         dpReader.Read(gridStatus);
00075                 }
00076 
00077                 // coordinates are in floats, assume there is only one row
00078                 FPoint value;
00079                 for (int32_t i = 1; i < cols; i+=2)
00080                 {
00081                         dpReader.Read(value.x);
00082                         dpReader.Read(value.y);
00083                         rgn.pts.push_back(value);
00084                 }
00085 
00086                 data.SetGlobalGrid(gridStatus, rgn);
00087 
00088                 ReadGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(data, dpReader.GetDataSetHeader());
00089         }
00090         catch(DataSetNotFoundException& e)
00091         {       // ignore
00092         }
00093 }
00094 
00095 /*
00096  * Read subgrids
00097  */
00098 void DATFileReader::ReadSubgrids(DATData& data, DataGroupReader& dcReader)
00099 {
00100         try
00101         {
00102                 FRegion rgn;
00103                 DataSetReader dpReader = dcReader.GetDataSetReader(DAT_SUBGRID);
00104                 int32_t rows = dpReader.GetDataSetHeader().GetRowCnt();
00105                 int32_t cols = dpReader.GetDataSetHeader().GetColumnCnt();
00106 
00107                 // coordinates are in floats, assume there is only one row
00108                 FPoint value;
00109                 for (int32_t n = 0; n < rows; n++)
00110                 {
00111                         u_int32_t gridStatus = 0;
00112                         if (cols > 0)
00113                         {
00114                                 dpReader.Read(gridStatus);
00115                         }
00116 
00117                         for (int32_t i = 1; i < cols; i+=2)
00118                         {
00119                                 dpReader.Read(value.x);
00120                                 dpReader.Read(value.y);
00121                                 rgn.pts.push_back(value);
00122                         }
00123                         data.AddSubgrid(gridStatus, rgn);
00124                         rgn.Clear();
00125                 }
00126         }
00127         catch(DataSetNotFoundException& e)
00128         {       // ignore
00129         }
00130 }
00131 
00132 /*
00133  * Read the grid alignment algorithm parameters.
00134  */
00135 void DATFileReader::ReadGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(DATData& data, const DataSetHeader& dsh)
00136 {
00137         data.ClearGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters();
00138 
00139         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt begin, end;
00140         dsh.GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00141 
00142         for (ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt ii = begin; ii != end; ++ii)
00143         {
00144                 data.AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(*ii);
00145         }
00146 }
